title: The Bridge
description: Unlock a World of Hacking-Themed Sounds: Dive into "The Bridge"
longDescription:
Dive into a realm of cyber intrigue as you delve into the captivating soundscape of "The Bridge" album. Drawing inspirations from the renowned games in the genre, this collection of ten tracks guides you through a sonic odyssey of hacking and technological marvels.


Comprising four high-energy action tracks and five versatile background music (BGM) pieces, along with an enthralling menu theme, "The Bridge" opens the gateway to an electrifying auditory adventure.


Genre(s): Ambient, Electronic, Sci-Fi, Techno, Futuristic, Synthwave


Album Content:

- 4 Action Music

- 5 Background Music

- 1 Menu Music


You can listen to the album trailer by following this link. (Opens to Youtube)


Duration and Other Important Information


Total album duration: 44 minutes

Does album loop?: Majority of the album

Can be edited and made loopable?: Yes

Is attribution neccessary?: No
